reviews.review_msg: I've taken 4 courses with Matt so far, and they have all been amazing. He's one of the best profs I have ever had. Everyone says how tough a marker he is, and that's true but he's so willing to help you, and his feedback is always great. Definitely recommend his classes but for students who are passionate enough and willing to put in the work.

Matt is the best English prof I've had so far.  His classes are interesting, he is a very fair marker, and he is flexible when it comes to assignments.  I had him for both 300 and 400, and I didn't want the semester to end!  He definately makes coming to class enjoyable, although be prepared to work hard and be on top of your reading!

(Both ENGL 300 and 400) Not to be repetitive here, but Matt is amazing. He teaches Medieval/Old English, but his personality blends it nicely with a contemporary flavour. He is extremely helpful, very flexible, and very knowledgeable. Lectures are a pleasure; easily one of the best classes I've ever taken. Expect to be on top of your work/readings.
